text: Gérard-Joseph Deschamps (4 July 1929 – 25 February 2022) was a Canadian Roman Catholic prelate. Deschamps was born in Eastview, Ontario. He became a priest in 1954. He was Bishop of Daru in Papua New Guinea from 1966 until 1999. He later became bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Bereina. He resigned in 2002. Deschamps died on 25 February 2022, at the age of 92. == References == Category:1929 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Canadian Roman Catholic bishops Category:People from Ontario
title: Gérard-Joseph Deschamps
